explanation: a person in a university who is in charge of a department of studies
sentence: Paweł Strzelecki is the dean of the Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics at the University of Warsaw.
sentence_gap: Paweł Strzelecki is the ____ of the Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics at the University of Warsaw.

sentence: These drugs have a proven deleterious effect on the nervous system.

sentence: It was observed that she was tearful when she was asked to take off her lower garments.
sentence_gap: It was observed that she was tearful when she was asked to take off her lower ________.

sentence: Many children are hapless victims of this war.
sentence_gap: Many children are _______ victims of this war.

explanation: a round wooden or metal container with a flat top and bottom, used especially for storing beer, like a barrel but smaller
sentence: A keg is usually the easiest way to provide beer to a large group of people.
sentence_gap: A ___ is usually the easiest way to provide beer to a large group of people.

explanation: (of an animal) to attack and injure someone by tearing their flesh; to touch someone or something in an unpleasant and/or violent way
sentence: He was mauled by a lion.
The fog is expected to have cleared away by midday.
sentence_gap: The fog is expected to have cleared away by ______.

explanation: a covering put over an animal's nose and mouth in order to prevent it from biting
sentence: She asked him to put a muzzle on his dog after it scared her children.
sentence_gap: She asked him to put a ______ on his dog after it scared her children.

explanation: that does not seem natural; that cannot be explained by natural laws
sentence: Anger gave me preternatural strength, and I managed to force the door open.
sentence_gap: Anger gave me _____________ strength, and I managed to force the door open.

sentence: He was regarded as a righteous and holy man.
sentence_gap: He was regarded as a _________ and holy man.

explanation: (in Christianity) the state of being saved from the power of evil; a way of protecting someone from danger, disaster, loss, etc.
sentence: Group therapy classes have been his salvation.
sentence_gap: Group therapy classes have been his _________.

explanation: literary; a short period when a person stays in a particular place
sentence: My sojourn in the youth hostel was thankfully short.
sentence_gap: My _______ in the youth hostel was thankfully short.

explanation: to argue noisily about something that is not very important
sentence: My sisters were squabbling over what to watch on TV.
sentence_gap: My sisters were __________ over what to watch on TV.

explanation: to prevent someone from doing what they want to do
sentence: She was thwarted in her attempt to take control of the party.
sentence_gap: She was ________ in her attempt to take control of the party.

explanation: strong string made of two or more pieces of string twisted together
sentence: Ropes and twines are widely employed for marine, agricultural, and general industrial use.
